channel.title: HeightLevel
channel.description:
Hey i need some help.
I basically coded my server from scratch and i'm having trouble using height levels.
The character & moreinfo buffered readers + writers are fine, it's just when for example i use heightLevel += 1 or i use the goup and godown commands it stays the same.
I tryed changing the heightlevel = 0 to heightlevel = 1 in the moreinfo AND character file but when i log on its still on height level 0 and changes the moreinfo & character file to 0... HALP
